If you line to use image You should give it class name. Not sure how to do it? Just open this file located at _posts dir.

If you give class name left then image float left. If you give class name right then image float right. If image is big then you don’t need to give it class name at all. Images still have nice treatment.

about

_layouts is a theme gallary for Jekyll powered websites. Themes are created by me, Yuya Saito who is an web designer/frontend developer in Tokyo, Japan.
Unless otherwise noted, themes here are all MIT licenced which means you can do whatever you want as long as you don't sue me.
You can read more detail on my github repository.
And of course, this site is powerd by jekyll.

if you like what i've done

  • you could give me an invite for Forrst or Dribbble
  • or you can follow me at Twitter
